item.title: Videos: How to help translating PrestaShop into Spanish (ES)
item.description: This article, in Spanish, has been written by Jesús Ruiz Garcia, an active contributor to the Spanish documentation and software translation. Jesús has started a project to improve and harmonize the Spanish translation of PrestaShop. If you want to join him and contribute to the Spanish translation, watch these short videos to know how it works! ¿Cómo ayudar a traducir el software de PrestaShop en español? El equipo de PrestaShop está trabajando continuamente en mejoras del software.
